entry.title: Not Until You Say Goodbye
entry.summary:
Author: Mat_Vibes

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 33,243Chapters: 8/?Kudos: 14

Summary: What if the end of the world wasn’t just about destruction—but about love rewriting fate?In this story, Tim Drake is pulled into NERV, an organization that controls powerful mechs to fight off monstrous beings known as Angels. But saving the world is only half the battle—he also has to deal with all sorts of problems, especially his love-struck brothers and his own complicated feelings.As Tim faces powerful enemies to protect humanity, love, trust, and heartbreak start to shift the story from a tale of survival to something more—something deeper. Because in a world where everything seems predetermined, can the love between two people be enough to change destiny itself?If you’re looking for an epic mix of high-stakes action, deep emotions, and a love story powerful enough to defy fate—this is for you.

entry.title: chaos, crowned.
entry.summary:
Author: lastbudnotleast

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 22,162Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 60

Summary: "So here I am, at probably the worst school in the country. Whose alumni are nothing but arms dealers, serial killers, and corporate lawyers. Real scum. And that old creep thinks he can tame me? We shall see, my friend. I only give people what they have coming to them." - Tim DrakeTim knew from the start that enrolling in Gotham Academy would be pure hell—and he was right. Every hallway, every sneer, every shadow confirmed it. But everything shifted the moment he met Damian Wayne. Something in him changed, though whether for better or worse, even he couldn’t say.

entry.title: Hidden Yearnings
entry.summary:
Author: robinkink

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,293Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 81

Summary: “Like what?” he asked, his voice deliberately low, his breath ghosting over Tim’s face. Tim didn’t answer right away. Instead, his fingers slipped under the hem of Damian’s shirt, tracing a slow, calculated path along his skin. Every touch was intentional, a deliberate attempt to crack the perfect mask of control Damian wore so well. “Submissive,” Tim whispered the word like a secret. And it was — a forbidden intimacy between two boys, especially two who were, at least on paper, brothers. Tim didn’t care about that now. He leaned in closer, his lips brushing against Damian’s ear. “Vulnerable.” A collection of Tim Drake and Damian Wayne smut moments

entry.summary:
Author: singformeangel

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,131Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 116

Summary: Desperate to prove his superiority (and thoroughly disgusted by Drake's continuous lack of self-preservation) Damian sets out to obtain picture evidence of Drake's inadequacy. Diligence and pertinacity lead Damian to a golden opportunity--his phone poised and ready to capture Drake in the act of hiding yet another injury, but the resulting photograph captures far more than a self-destructive white lie.Furious, Damian launches a one-man inquisition, uncovering a truth far more nuanced and dark than he could have ever expected, and he finds himself questioning far more than just Timothy Jackson Drake's sanity.

entry.title: we'll live for younger days
entry.summary:
Author: orphicgaze

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,225Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 208

Summary: "Flowers," Tim said the word as if he's masticated it beyond recognition, a rasp of consonants pushed together with barely a vowel in between. "You got me--flowers." Damian's eyebrow ticked up. The bouquet in his hand shivered in the air, blood-red tulips specked with smaller white wildflowers in between. "It's customary for the occasion. I understand you never attended yours, but I'm sure you're at least tangentially aware of this." Damian's high school senior prom night, also known as the day Tim Drake (almost) drinks himself to death.
